item.title: Interview of Harsha G Rao
item.description: Overview In this episode we talk interview Harsha Gururaja Rao. Twitter: https://twitter.com/harshagrao LinkedIn: https://in.linkedin.com/in/harshagrao He is currently working at Airbus in Germany as a manager helping to predictably maintain the air cabin using data. He is also a commentator in Star Sports Kannada for Bengaluru FC where he continues to do it remotely. Full Podcast YouTube: Spotify:
